about_the_game:
Step into the quirky world of Capybara Fighters!, a vibrant 2D/3D hybrid beat-em up game set in the bustling streets of modern Tokyo. As the star capybara living in a popular Capybara Cafe, your peaceful life is turned upside down when ninjas and the Yakuza break in and abduct your friend. To rescue them, you'll need to battle through waves of enemies, save up money, and ultimately secure a plane ticket to Brazil where the final showdown awaits.

Gameplay Highlights:
- Fight: Engage in fast-paced, action-packed combat with a mix of unique moves and combos. Battle through various Tokyo districts, each teeming with challenging foes.
- Explore: Traverse a colorful urban environment filled with cars, trains, vending machines, and modern stores. Experience dynamic weather and day-night cycles that add variety to your journey.
- Earn: Defeat enemies to earn money, which you can use to buy items, power-ups, and ultimately a plane ticket to Brazil.
- Strategize: Utilize environmental objects and interactive elements to gain an edge in combat. Master the art of using your surroundings to outsmart tougher opponents.

Why You'll Love It:
Capybara Fighters! combines the charming aesthetics of classic beat-em up games with a fresh, engaging storyline. The dynamic combat system, coupled with a rich, vibrant world, ensures an immersive gaming experience. Whether you’re a fan of pixel art or love action-packed adventures, this game offers a delightful blend of humor, strategy, and heartwarming moments. Join the capybara crusade and fight to save your friend in this epic Tokyo adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
